attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to ensure that the goverment step in and stop any of the tottenham managment or board from getting sacked and allow them to finish the job that they have started this season, which is to get tottenham into the fizzy pop league.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
